featured.text: Many of his works—depictions of children at play and in school, farm girls attending to their work, hunters and their prey—have become classic images of nineteenth-century American life.
The profits of Prince Charles’s organic farm go to _____ to help the poor and the sick.
Members can access thousands of listings for apartments, villas, suburban homes and farms around the world.
In the Indian state of Assam, growing numbers of tea farms are destroying the Asian elephant’s habitats and endangering their population.

other.text: Since the elephants need to use tea plantations as landmarks when navigating forests, they almost inevitably have to move through the farms.
Known locally as nopal, the prickly pear is farmed on a massive scale in Mexico.

definition.zh_def: 農場；農田，專門用來種植作物或飼養動物的地方。
definition.en_def: A piece of land used for growing crops or raising animals.
definition.example: The farmer worked hard every day on his farm.
